summary: This mod change appearance of Rayya follower from Hearthfire DLC. Rayya is a Redguard warrior found in the Jarl's Longhouse in Falkreath. She becomes your personal housecarl when you have earned the title of Thane in Falkreath Hold.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Rayya Housecarl Makeover
Version: 1.1
Date: 11/6/2012
Category: Companions - other
Author(s): GrandSeifer

Description
===========

This mod change appearance of Rayya follower from Hearthfire DLC. Rayya is a Redguard warrior found in the Jarl's Longhouse in Falkreath. She becomes your personal housecarl when you have earned the title of Thane in Falkreath Hold.

Details
=======

Changes made by this mod:
- changed appearance of Rayya NPC,
- changed her "Opposite Gender Anims" to false,
- if you want to remove her hood you need other mod, that allow this. ( UFO, AFT etc.)

Requirement
===========

This two are needed for this mod to work.

- Hearthfire DLC
- ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii v.1.5 Full- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168


I recommend following mods (this mods were used to make screenshots)

- univision Face by DD AKT - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569 (and eye pack from same author)
- DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709


Install
=======

Always backup your save before installing new mod.

1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)Data
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

[color=Yellow]Note: If you are using UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul, make sure that, Rayya makeover mod is below UFO in the mods load order.[/color]

Uninstall
=========

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

SkyrimDatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomHearthFires.esm�0005215.nif
SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintHearthFires.esm�0005215.dds
SkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTintHearthFires.esm�0005215.tga
SkyrimDataRayya Housecarl Makeover GRW.esp


Incompatibility
===============

Any mod that changes Rayya NPC.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================

If you add this mod after you first time saw Rayya NPC in game, her data will be already stored in your save game, and she can unequip her armor.

If something is broken or doesn't work quite right, notify me. Thank you.

History
=======

1.1, 2012/11/06 - Removed changes i made to her default outfit in version 1.0.
1.0, 2012/10/26 - Initial release.

Contact
=======

You can find me on Nexus as 'GrandSeifer'

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Apachii for ApachiiSkyHair.
Thanks to DD AKT for univision Face.
Thanks to dimon99 for DIMONIZED UNP female body.
Thanks to MorninJerky for Beautiful Whiterun.
Thanks to Dheuster for Amazing Follower Tweaks.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
TES Construction Set
Readme Generator

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
